titleStmt.title: To all simple, honest-intending, and innocent people without respect to sects, opinions, or distinguishing names, who desire to walk with God in the pure spirit of life and true understanding : I send greeting in the harmless love of God.
titleStmt.author: J. P. (John Perrot), d. 1671?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bevan-Naish Collection, Woodbrooke College.
